document_data.name: Dark Gateway
document_data.mainbody: The '''Dark Gateway''', which was also called the '''Upper Temple''', was a shrine dedicated to [[Ibrandul]], the Lord of the Dry Depths.
document_data.Location: This secret shrine was located in the [[Waterdeep/Trades Ward|Trades Ward]] of [[Waterdeep]].
document_data.Activities: The shrine was connected to the [[Deep Temple of Dark Hope]] in the [[Underdark]] via a two-way ''[[gate]]''.
